forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 17 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 55. West southwest wind 8 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun casts its golden light upon Downtown San Francisco this afternoon, the city basks in the embrace of clear skies, with temperatures gently hovering around a mild 64 degrees. With conditions this lovely, one can almost hear the sound of laughter drifting from outdoor cafés and the rhythmic tapping of shoes on sidewalks, as residents and visitors alike take pleasure in strolling through bustling streets. A light westerly breeze whispers through the air, invigorating the atmosphere while keeping any swelter at bay.

As evening approaches, the sky will soften into a gentle palette of Partly Cloudy tones, likely hosting a few wandering clouds. The temperature will ease down to a comfortable 55, perfect for shedding that midday warmth. Those venturing out might find a light jacket or sweater to be a wise companion as the winds pick up strength, offering bursts of briskness that stir the air. Now is a splendid time to explore the local art galleries or duplicate the romantic setting of the evening light with a visit to a quaint bookstore, where the charm of the city unfolds on each page.
